ygData.subject: Mistmoore Battle Drum
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I purchased a MM drum yesterday, for the low price of 250pp + a LizardScale Cloak, negotiated down to that from 500pp, mainly I think, because a group
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I purchased a MM drum yesterday, for the low price of 250pp + a
LizardScale Cloak, negotiated down to that from 500pp, mainly I think,
because a group was selling it and wanted a quick return.

After getting it I was quite disappointed. I didn't seem to run that
much faster, and I couldn't find a percussion song that had a
quantifiable effect increase. Is this due to the recent patch issue that
affected MM drum and selo's? Or can someone reccommend a song I can play
to see the difference?

Uldar Ulfangson
31st Bard, Rodcet Nife
